column4: Hi there.  I'm just wondering can Ubuntu 9.04 handle dial-up internet connections, will it work?
Just I have a friend who I'm going to visit in a couple of weeks and I only have Ubuntu on my laptop and I don't know if dial up will work or not with it.
theoretically, yes. But it isn't the easiest thing to make work. and the ISP makes a little bit of difference, too.

oh right.  I tried last time when I went and it didn't work, it didn't even detect it and it was all plugged in okay, but I thought it was just my laptop as I was running Ubuntu through Wubi at that time
